name: allip-mpmm
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of allip-mpmm, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of allip-mpmm with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Create a concept art in a consistent painterly style while adhering the rules of the tabletop fantasy world. Show a muscular creature with unique limbs, possibly resembling an allip-mpmm, standing next to a human silhouette for comparison. This scene should be set in a zone that merges the beauty of sky and the depths of sea, highlighting the motion of the both characters and the surrounding elements. Maintain a sense of aquatic fantasy realism by incorporating bioluminescent accents and reflecting the light patterns created by subsurface water caustics. Culture-specific gear should be included, that complements the medieval fantasy theme without any influence from modern technology. Utilize a three-color palette focusing on aquatic hues like teals, deep blues, sea-greens, and add pearl-like highlights to enhance the mystical appeal. The materials to depict this scene should give an impression of being under a pressure-dome. Avoid any visual artifacts, unnecessary text, random letters or symbols. Also, refrain from using sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, and anime style, keeping the overall artwork a blend of realism and fantasy.
